candidates.title: chore: add backports to 0.4000.0 rc.3
candidates.body:
A mirror of #410.

Significant backports include:
- #407: ui dependency version bumps that should address issues faced while bumping the `vite-plugin-svelte` dependency by #431
- #414: apply ci runtime improvements from weekly which also include removal of `holochain` as a scaffolding dependency

Additional fixe
- [Pin typescript version for vue-tsc compatibility](https://github.com/holochain/scaffolding/pull/432/commits/8e6cfac06bc8e6ed2d86415cdfb85ec5f1c210e8)

candidates.title: chore: backport and release 0.3000.9
candidates.body: Backport #397, #398, #411 and #415 and bump dependency versions for `0.3`

candidates.title: fix: Skip writing scaffold config for nixified custom templates
candidates.body:
~This PR introduces a global `--skip-config-check` flag that does as the name suggests, to provide an option to skip reading from `hcScaffold` config in the root package.json file. Using this flag will be mostly beneficial to users who scaffolded their hApps with a nix wrapper based custom template.~

This PR skips writing scaffold configs for web-apps or examples scaffolded from nixified custom templates

Closes #247

candidates.title: chore: Update holochain dependencies
candidates.body:
This PR cleans up holochain dependency usage in the following ways:
- Removes unused `holochain_utils` crate; this dependency was only used with a single error variant which was not converted from anywhere in the code
- Replaces `test_utils` feature from holochain with `hdk`.

candidates.title: fix: preserve line comments on creating/ modifying rust code
candidates.body:
This PR ensures line comments are preserved on modifying or creating new rust files while running scaffold commands that do so.

While this PR addresses the problem, it does open up another issue which I think is tolerable for now: Developer manually written doc comments `///` will end up getting converted to line comments `//` on running scaffolding commands that modify this file. While the comments will still be retained, they will take on a different format. I think this minor hiccup is tolerable, I will open up another issue so that we can keep track of it an make developers aware of this peculiarity.

Extra changes:
- [Move important scaffold functions to the top of the module for easy access](https://github.com/holochain/scaffolding/pull/382/commits/f7c01e5f65ebb6773be8b8ec39b4559cdbbbaa3d)
- [Fix improper use of `bool.then_some`](https://github.com/holochain/scaffolding/pull/382/commits/114c708a5224739c9bf941eb913804b408706670)

---

Fixes #167 
Fixes https://github.com/holochain/Components/issues/47

candidates.title: chore: Switch to `github:holochain/holonix`
candidates.body:
Updates Nix flake for repo and scaffolded happs to use `github:holochain/holonix`. 

Key changes:
- Scaffolding CLI now exposed as a Nix package, installed in `default` and `ci` devShells
- Eliminates workarounds from the [manual testing guide](https://github.com/holochain/scaffolding/blob/develop/guides/manual-testing.md)
- Retains most functionality from previous flake

Note: Merge #321 first to resolve Svelte template CI failure.

candidates.title: feat: programatically format generated svelte and vue markup
fix: improve ts codegen and formatting for ts/tsx files
candidates.body:
This PR improves TypeScript and tsx code generation and formatting. It includes several key changes and fixes:

- Replaces template-derived `types.ts` files with Rust-generated ones.
- Implements programmatic formatting for initially generated ts/tsx files as well as the script block of vue sfcs but not the template block, svelte programmatic formatting not yet supported

Closes #309
